g1.title: Advanced ML Pipeline & Model Management
g1.description: Implement advanced ML pipeline with model versioning, A/B testing, automated training, and production model serving
features_planned: Model versioning and A/B testing for continuous improvement
Automated training pipeline with hyperparameter optimization
Production model serving with low-latency inference
Model explainability and interpretability for compliance
Federated learning for distributed model training
Model drift detection and automated retraining
MLOps pipeline with automated validation and deployment

g2.title: Natural Language Processing & Understanding
g2.description: Implement advanced NLP capabilities with transformer architectures, language understanding, and conversational AI
features_planned: Transformer architectures for natural language understanding
Conversational AI with context-aware responses
Language model fine-tuning for domain-specific tasks
Sentiment analysis and emotion detection
Text summarization and content generation
Multi-language support with translation capabilities
Voice-to-text and text-to-speech integration

g3.title: Computer Vision & Image Analysis
g3.description: Implement computer vision capabilities with image recognition, object detection, and visual analytics
features_planned: Computer vision for monitoring dashboard analysis
Image recognition and object detection
Visual regression testing for UI components
Facial recognition and biometric authentication
Document analysis and OCR capabilities
Video analysis and motion detection
Visual analytics with pattern recognition

g4.title: Quantum Computing & Advanced Analytics
g4.description: Implement quantum computing platform preparation and advanced analytics with graph neural networks
features_planned: Quantum computing platform preparation
Graph neural networks for system topology analysis
Time series analysis with LSTM and attention mechanisms
Reinforcement learning for automated decision making
Advanced analytics with predictive modeling
Quantum-resistant cryptography preparation
Quantum machine learning algorithms
